Sentencas: Applications of ceria, CeO2 in catalysis and solid oxide fuel cells arise from the relative ease with which oxygen vacancies are formed, producing reactive sites or facilitating ionic diffusion.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria

Sentencas: In this paper, we consider modelling oxygen vacancies in bulk ceria and on the low index surfaces, as well as oxygen vacancy migration in bulk.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria

Sentencas: We apply density functional theory (DFT), corrected for on-site Coulomb interactions, DFT+U, since DFT is unable to describe correctly the electronic structure of defective ceria.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria

Sentencas: We obtain a description of oxygen vacancies consistent with experiment, with localisation of charge on the Cc ions neighbouring the vacancy site.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria

Sentencas: Confirming classical interatomic potential results, the oxygen vacancy formation energy in reduced on surfaces compared to bulk.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria

Sentencas: An elastic band approach is applied to the study of vacancy migration in bulk ceria, yielding a diffusion path and energy barrier which are compared with previous studies.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation and migration in ceria
